last_episode_to_air.name: Asian Sea Bass and Chorizo Carbonara
last_episode_to_air.overview: Jamie Oliver cooks Asian sea bass, sticky rice and dressed greens, plus chorizo carbonara and Catalan market salad.

name: Jamie's 15-Minute Meals
overview: Building on the success of Jamie's 30 Minute Meals, this show squeezes the cooking process even further, with each half hour episode featuring two delicious, nutritious, super-fast family meals back-to-back. So even if you're rushed off your feet at work, there's no excuse for not giving these meals a go.

episodes.name: Chilli Con Carne Meatballs and Sticky Kicking Chicken
episodes.overview: Jamie creates chilli con carne meatballs and sticky kicking chicken, watermelon radish salad and crunchy noodles.

episodes.name: Fish Stew and Asian Beef
episodes.overview: On the menu are flashy fish stew, saffron sauce and garlic bread, plus seared Asian beef, best noodle salad and ginger dressing.

episodes.name: Camembert Parcels and Golden Chicken
episodes.overview: Jamie makes crispy Camembert parcels, autumn salad and cranberry dip, plus golden chicken with braised greens and potato gratin.

episodes.name: Beef Stroganoff and Moroccan Mussels
episodes.overview: Jamie rustles up a beef stroganoff with fluffy rice and red onion and parsley pickle. Later he makes Moroccan mussels with tapenade toasties and cucumber salad.

episodes.name: Fish Baps and Mushroom Farfalle
episodes.overview: Jamie makes his best fish baps, mushy peas and tartare sauce. Later he cooks mushroom farfalle with blue cheese and a hazelnut and apple salad.

episodes.name: Lamb Lollipops and Prawn Linguini
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks lamb lollipops, curry sauce and rice and peas, plus prawn linguini and Sicilian shaved fennel salad.

episodes.name: Chicken Dim Sum and Crab Briks
episodes.overview: On the menu this time is chicken dim sum, coconut buns, cucumber pickle and hoi sin sauce, plus crackin' crab briks, couscous salad and salsa.

episodes.name: Crispy Duck and Chicken Cacciatore
episodes.overview: Jamie shows how to cook crispy duck and hoi sin lettuce parcels, and chicken cacciatore, spaghetti and smoky tomato sauce.

episodes.name: Moroccan Bream and British Burgers
episodes.overview: This time Jamie rustles up Moroccan bream, couscous salad, pomegranate and harissa, and British burgers, shred salad, pickles and things.

episodes.name: Jerk Pork and Poached Chicken
episodes.overview: This time it's jerk pork, grilled corn and crunchy tortilla salad, plus minestrone, poached chicken and salsa verde.

episodes.name: Swedish Meatballs and Pasta Pesto
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks Swedish meatballs, celeriac and spinach rice, plus pasta pesto, garlic and rosemary chicken.

episodes.name: Green Tea Salmon and Modern Greek Salad
episodes.overview: On the menu in this edition are green tea salmon, coconut rice and miso greens, plus modern greek salad, spinach, chickpea and feta parcels.

episodes.name: Grilled Steak and Blackened Chicken
episodes.overview: This edition's recipes are grilled steak, ratatouille and saffron rice, plus blackened chicken, and San Fran quinoa salad.

episodes.name: Pork Steaks and Killer Kedgeree
episodes.overview: Jamie rustles up pork steaks, Hungarian pepper sauce and rice, plus killer kedgeree, beans, greens and chilli yoghurt.

episodes.name: Rosemary Chicken and Happy Cow Burgers
episodes.overview: On the menu are rosemary chicken, grilled polenta and porcini tomato sauce, plus happy cow burgers, old-school coleslaw and corn on the cob.

episodes.name: Sticky Squid Balls and Grilled Prawns
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks sticky squid balls, grilled prawns and noodle broth, plus sausage fusilli and creamy garden salad.

episodes.name: Greek Chicken and Smoked Salmon
episodes.overview: On the menu is smoked salmon, Yorkshire pud, beets and asparagus, plus gorgeous Greek chicken, sweet pepper and pea couscous with tzatziki.

episodes.name: Sizzling Chops and Asparagus Lasagnetti
episodes.overview: This time Jamie cooks glazed sizzling chops, sweet tomato and asparagus lasagnetti, plus mushroom soup, stilton, apple and walnut croutes.

episodes.name: Asian Tuna and Coconut Rice
episodes.overview: Jamie rustles up seared Asian tuna, coconut rice and jiggy jiggy greens, plus ricotta fritters, tomato sauce and courgette salad.

episodes.name: Falafel Wraps and Spiced Chicken Lentils
episodes.overview: This time the meal is spiced chicken, bacon, asparagus and spinach lentils, plus falafel wraps, grilled veg and salsa.

episodes.name: Grilled Tuna and Thai Chicken
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks grilled tuna, kinda Nicoise salad, Thai chicken laksa and mildly-spiced noodle squash broth.

episodes.name: Lamb Tagine and Chicken Caesar Salad
episodes.overview: Quick lamb tagine, pan-fried aubergine and cumin crunch, plus crispy polenta chicken caesar salad.

episodes.name: Fettuccine and Black Bean Beef Burgers
episodes.overview: This time it's fettuccine, smoked trout, asparagus and peas, and black bean beef burgers, noodles and pickle salad.

episodes.name: Pork Marsala and Thai Noodles
episodes.overview: On the menu is pork Marsala, porcini rice and spring greens, plus koh samui salad, chilli tofu and Thai noodles.

episodes.name: Crispy Pork and Grilled Mushroom Sub
episodes.overview: On the menu is crispy Parma pork, minted courgettes and brown rice, plus grilled mushroom sub, smoky pancetta, melted cheese and pears.

episodes.name: Chicken Fajitas and King Prawns
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks sizzling chicken fajitas, grilled peppers, salsa, rice and beans, and prawn cocktail, king prawns and sundried pan bread.

episodes.name: Sizzling Beef Steak and Mighty Mackerel
episodes.overview: On the menu is sizzling beef steak, hoi sin prawn and noodle bowls, mighty mackerel, and mixed tomato and quinoa salad.

episodes.name: Steak, Liver and Bacon and Mexican Tomato Soup
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks up some steak, liver and bacon, bubble and squeak mash and red onion gravy, and Mexican tomato soup, chilli nachos, and veggie and feta sprinkles.

episodes.name: Glazed Pork Fillet and Tapas Bruschetta
episodes.overview: Jamie makes glazed pork fillet, cajun-style pepper rice and barbecue sauce, and tapas bruschetta, and golden grilled sardines.

episodes.name: Lamb Kofte and Keralan Veggie Curry
episodes.overview: On the menu this time is lamb kofte, pitta and greek salad, and Keralan veggie curry, poppadoms, rice and minty yoghurt.

episodes.name: White Fish Tagine and Spicy Cajun Chicken
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks white fish tagine, with carrot, mint and clementine salad, plus Spicy Cajun chicken, smashed sweet potato and fresh corn salsa.

episodes.name: Beef Kofta Curry and Spring Frittata
episodes.overview: On the menu in this episode are beef kofta curry, fluffy rice, beans and peas, plus spring frittata, tomato toasts, watercress and pea salad.

episodes.name: Chorizo and Squid, and Simple Spaghetti
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks chorizo and squid with greek-style couscous salad, plus simple spaghetti, tomato, basil and creamy curd salad.

episodes.name: Lamb Meatballs and Chicken Salad
episodes.overview: Jamie rustles up lamb meatballs, chop salad and harissa yoghurt, plus incredibly delicious chicken salad.

episodes.name: Crab Bolognese and Mexican BLT
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks crab bolognese with crunchy fennel salad, plus mexican BLT, chillies, guacamole and salad.

episodes.name: Cajun Steak and Chicken Tikka
episodes.overview: Jamie cooks Cajun steak, smoky baked beans and collard greens, plus chicken tikka, lentil, spinach and naan salad.

episodes.name: Noodle Broth and Veggie Chilli
episodes.overview: On the menu this time is squid 'n' prawns spicy vegetable noodle broth, plus veggie chilli, crunchy tortilla and avocado salad.

episodes.name: Asian Fish and Ultimate Pork Tacos
episodes.overview: Jamie shows how to prepare in 15 minutes both Asian fish, miso noodles and crunchy veg, and ultimate pork tacos, spicy black beans and avocado garden salad.

episodes.name: Sausage Gnocchi and Mexican Chicken
episodes.overview: This time the two meals cooked up in a quarter of an hour are sausage gnocchi, warm kale and bean salad, plus Mexican chicken, wicked mole sauce, veg and rice.

episodes.name: Asian Sea Bass and Chorizo Carbonara
episodes.overview: Jamie Oliver cooks Asian sea bass, sticky rice and dressed greens, plus chorizo carbonara and Catalan market salad.
